channel.title: Växjö on Georgios Karamanis

item.title: Moving
item.description: Jogging, walking and cycling in Växjö, Sweden ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5489.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5449.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-27-20124moving/20120321-GKAR5511.jpg)

item.title: Water Square
item.description: The Vattentorget (Water Square) by the lake in Växjö, Sweden. Sounds logical to me. ![](/images/2012-04-24-20124water-square/20120320-GKAR5399.jpg)

item.title: Under the bridge
item.description: Photos taken in Växjö, Sweden during the rainy day. ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5350.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5383.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-23-20124under-the-bridge/20120320-GKAR5390.jpg)

item.title: A rainy day in Växjö
item.description: They say bad weather is good weather in terms of photography. A month ago I was in Växjö, a beautiful city in south Sweden. The first day there was a rainy one and I definitely think that the “best” photos were taken during that day. ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5312.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5301.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5317.jpg) ![](/images/2012-04-17-20124a-rainy-day-in-vxj/20120320-GKAR5319.jpg)
